| Name  | Age | City     |
|-------|-----|----------|
| Alice | 30  | New York |
| Bob   | 25  | London   |

| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|
| L    |   C    |     R |
| LL   |  CC    |    RR |

| Command |
|---------|
| `ls`    |
| `pwd`   |

| Col1 | Col2 | Col3 | Col4 | Col5 | Col6 |
|------|------|------|------|------|------|
| a    | b    | c    | d    | e    | f    |
| g    | h    | i    | j    | k    | l    |

| Path                                              | Status |
|---------------------------------------------------|--------|
| /very/long/path/to/some/deeply/nested/file.txt    | OK     |
| /another/extremely/long/filesystem/path/here.rs   | Error  |

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `std::collections::HashMap` | A hash map |
| `Vec<String>` | A vector of strings |
